name: Ricetta: Tramezzino dell'avventuriere
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making an Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich.

value.name: Uovo d'uccello
value.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

value.name: Prosciutto
value.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

value.name: Tramezzino dell'avventuriere
value.desc: A nutritious egg dish. Luxurious mayonnaise sits atop a lining of ham and poached egg toast. The smooth mouthfeel fills you with energy for the long road ahead, and is one of the Adventurers' Guild's top-rated breakfasts.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Reward from reaching Reputation Level 4 in Mondstadt</color>
